title: National Mall and Memorial Parks: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping       National Mall and Memorial Parks has two concessioners that offer great eating options while visiting.  The East Potomac Grill is located on Hains Point at the East Potomac Golf Course.  Guest Services operates nine food kiosks on and around the National Mall. Check out the links to see full menus.  For additional Restaurant and Lodging choices within the Washington D.C. area look at the Destination DC Website.  Please note that this link is provided only as an aid to your travel planning; it is not intended as an endorsement of any of the establishments listed.
